channel.title: Adding Completionist Cape
channel.description:
Ok well i was adding a completionst cape...I did everything correct...Models in cache-Raw and ints in itemdef and added it into item.cfg..I got a error of item id does not exist so i replaced the case and the item id in item.cfg with 1031 (for some cape that is weird) and when i spawn it its still the regular 1031 cape.
I am willing to pay if thats what it takes...Add me on skype Rspsdesigner.

item.title: Adding Completionist Cape
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
